title: Former South Korea leader Yoon Suk Yeol faces insurrection verdict over martial law declaration
desc: South Korean prosecutors have called for the former president to be sentenced to death.

title: AI Summit: India has central role in shaping AI’s future, Anthropic CEO Dario Amodei says
desc: At the AI Impact Summit in New Delhi, Anthropic CEO Dario Amodei emphasized that India holds a crucial position in guiding artificial intelligence's future. The company is expanding its presence in India, opening an office in Bengaluru and forming partnerships. India's leadership is vital for navigating AI's economic, societal, and security challenges, as well as its immense potential.

title: UAE Space Agency extends its Mars mission until 2028
desc: The UAE Space Agency has announced the extension of the Emirates Mars Mission, the Hope Probe, until 2028, adding three more years to its operations. The decision comes in light of the mission's strong scientific achievements and the continued high performance
